step2.title: Password
step2.description: Now, define your password. To maximize security, a pop up will open directly on your device via MassaStation.

step3.title: Backup
step3.description: Security is very important, we recommend backing up your account using a key pair or a .yaml file. Would you like to do it now or later?

errors.nickname-invalid-format: The account name can't contain any special characters

unexpected-error.title: Oops!
unexpected-error.link: Go back to the Welcome page!

send.invalid-recipient: Recipient's address doesn't seem to be a valid Massa address

send-redirect.account-not-found: Account not found - redirecting to account creation page. You can import this account with its private key
send-redirect.no-account: No account found - redirecting to account creation page

sendcoins.advanced-message: You pay gas fees to reward block validators and maximize your chances to see your transaction validated. It is a tip for people that support the blockchain network.
sendcoins.gas-info: {default} gas fees are {xx} nMAS and defined by Massa Labs to assure minimum tip to block validator. If you want to custom them go to advanced section in previous screen

placeholder.teaser-banner: Our new feature is coming soon
placeholder.teaser-home-page: If you're here, it's because you wanted to see your dashboard! Don't panic, you'll soon be able to do in very soon!
placeholder.teaser-transaction-page: If you're here, it's because you wanted to see your transactions! Don't panic, in less than 3 months you'll be able to consult them.
placeholder.teaser-contacts-page: Managing your contact list for a smoother transaction management. Unlocked by end of summer 2023
placeholder.teaser-assets-page: All types of tokens in one page, that's what you'll be able to manage in less than 3 months. Be ready!

send-redirect.redirecting: Hey {nickname}! We're transferring you to the send coin page
